title: 645: BITCOIN ON TRACK FOR $307K BY START OF 2022!!!!! AMAZON DENIES BTC PAYMENTS RUMOR!!!!!
description:
Bitcoin maximalist, Robert Breedlove is not backing away from his bold BTC price prediction.

In a new interview with Stansberry Research, Breedlove tells Daniela Cambone that despite the recent price hurdles, Bitcoin is still on track for $307K by the start of 2022. Whereas he previously predicted BTC reach this target by Oct., he has moved his forecast to Q1 next year.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
